mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and blue on yellow) announcing James Brown, the Seventieth Birthday, Back to the Promised Land on May 3. Poster features a metal photoplate of James Brown. Poster is part of a unique limited run ordered by MTV as a gift for James Brown.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
